courses.description:
Overcoming Obstacles and Building Resilience:
Learn and Build The Thinking to Overcome Any Obstacles and Become Resilience


Life is full of challenges and difficulties, but with the right tools and mindset, you can overcome anything. Our course is designed to empower you to take control of your life and build resilience in the face of adversity. Whether you're facing personal struggles or have found yourself in a refugee situation, our expert guidance will help you navigate the most trying times with confidence and grace.
In this course, we will discuss various strategies and techniques for overcoming and dealing with challenging and tough situations. We will explore the importance of building a positive mindset and the role it plays in facing difficult challenges. You will learn how to find quick solutions to problems, and how to develop a resilient attitude that will help you to not just survive, but thrive in tough situations.
We understand that life can be unpredictable and that sometimes, you may find yourself in situations that you never thought you would be in. Whether you're dealing with personal struggles or have become a refugee, our course will provide you with the tools and strategies to handle any negativity and find a way forward. Our expert instructors will share their own personal experiences and provide insights on how they handled difficult situations, offering valuable advice and guidance for you to apply in your own life.
We believe that everyone has the potential to achieve greatness, and that with the right mindset and approach, anyone can overcome any obstacle. Our course is designed to empower you to take control of your life and build resilience in the face of adversity. Whether you're facing personal struggles or have found yourself in a refugee situation, our expert guidance will help you navigate the most trying times with confidence and grace.
Enroll in our course today and take the first step towards a brighter future. Invest in yourself and empower yourself to achieve greatness. With our guidance, you'll learn how to not just survive but thrive in tough situations. Don't let life's challenges hold you back. With our course, you'll be prepared to face any obstacle that comes your way and come out victorious.

By taking this Resilience Masterclass: Build a Refugee Mindset for Survival you will be able to:

Build the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness
Learn practical skills to be resilient and survive
Get ready to win all crises, losses, money, sickness, break-up…
Will become creative, fast, live better, and more successful


So what are you waiting for, let's start building resiliency!
target_audience: Anyone Who Who Wants to Overcome Any Difficulties or Recover from Tough Situation and Find Meaning

COMBATTING STRESSORS: Backing Away From the Stress Cliff

courses.description:
We are top Udemy instructors in the personal development category. Our courses have been taken by over 800,000+ happy students from 200 countries.
We have a thriving community in the course and we are actively involved and answer questions within 24h.




Developing Emotional Intelligence is the biggest key to overcoming negative emotions, such as anxiety and fear.
This course will give you the tools that you need to develop emotional intelligence so you can recognize negative emotions (such as anxiety) while they’re happening, identify the triggers that cause the emotion, and overcome the emotion.
We’ve been told lies about our emotions:
Emotions are bad or that we’re not supposed to express them.
We should trust them—trust our gut—but, wait, no—emotions are irrational and shouldn’t be trusted
Emotions are something that happens TO us and, therefore, they’re outside of our control.
The truth is that you CAN control your emotional state, including fear and anxiety. You can learn how to avoid the unwanted ones and purposefully create the ones you want. Just think about an astronaut—they HAVE to learn how to control their mind, emotions and body in order to handle the extreme stress of living in space. And, if they are human beings and can develop their emotional intelligence to overcome any anxiety and fear, so can you.
In fact, the skill of emotional intelligence is perhaps the most valuable skill you can EVER acquire. By developing your INTRApersonal emotional intelligence skills, you are able to understand and regulate your own emotions. And that is the best way to be prepared to develop your INTERpersonal skills, a.k.a. your ability to understand other people's emotions.
Being able to cope with and prevent high intensity stress, anxiety and fear unlocks our greatest abilities, frees us to go for our wildest dreams, and is a powerful factor that is often overlooked when comparing those who are successful at achieving their dreams and those who are not.
For most of us, in our homes and schools, no one teaches us about our emotions and how they work.
No one teaches that WE can control emotions such as fear and anxiety by using the power of our own mind to become aware of our thoughts and feelings and so unlock the ability to choose our emotions and direct the content of our lives.
No one teaches us that lack of emotional management is what leads to drama, anxiety, suffering, addiction, stress and poor decisions…. And that if we learn to control our emotions we can avoid these things.
Emotional intelligence matters!
And that’s why we’ve created this course.  We’ll focus on 3 of the most undesirable emotions—uncertainty, anxiety, fear—and how you can use emotional awareness and self-control techniques to take back control of your emotions and feel better now.
We’ll teach you what your emotions REALLY mean, how to recognize them, and how to direct them in a way that allows you to move toward your life goals
We’ll teach how to get out of your head and become the observer of your emotions as they happen, so you can avoid being hijacked by your own brain and feel in control again. In other words, you will take your power back from anxiety, stress, and negative emotions.
In this course, you will learn:
Emotional Intelligence insights into to what emotions are and how they work
Emotional Intelligence tools to recognize and identify your emotions
Emotional Intelligence tools to direct your thoughts, giving you the power to direct your emotions
Emotional Intelligence techniques for re-framing your perspective to find the blessings hidden within the pain
How to take back your power and put yourself first
Emotional Intelligence techniques for stress reduction and to make every day more enjoyable
Proven emotional Intelligence tools for preventing loss of emotional control
Emotional Intelligence techniques for de-escalating anxiety and fear
NLP (neuro linguistic programming) techniques to rewire emotional reactions and anchor positive emotions
Emotional intelligence tools to cope with challenges using humor and other self-empowerment techniques
Emotional intelligence techniques to develop feelings of self-confidence and certainty
Emotional intelligence techniques to master feeling hopeful and joyful
So, if you are ready to reprogram your brain and let go of negative emotions, such as anxiety and fear, and learn the power of emotional intelligence enroll now, we look forward to seeing you in the course!
Guarantee: We know you will love this course. However, we offer a no-questions-asked 30-day money-back guarantee if the course does not meet your needs for any reason.  we look forward to seeing you in the course!
So, who are we:
We are Joeel & Natalie Rivera. We both have over a decade in the field of education, psychology, social service and life coaching. Joeel has a Master’s Degree in Counseling and Education and is finishing his dissertation for his PhD in Psychology with an emphasis on happiness. He is also a former psychology instructor. We have over 800,000+ students from 200 countries. We have worked with thousands of individuals and we’ve observed clearly that the content of people’s thoughts and focus influence their emotional state, which then influences their behavior and the results and outcomes they experience in their lives. We have each also had experiences in life that have pushed us to learn how to understand, identify and influence our own mental and emotional states—and our ability to control our emotions is directly responsible for the success we have created in life. In this course, we teach you everything we have learned through our own experiences, as well as through what we’ve learned from our clients, our research, our careers and our education.
Copyright  Transformation Services, Inc. All Rights Reserved
target_audience: You’re experiencing UNCERTAINTY in your life and want to feel confident and at ease.
You’re STRESSED OUT and want tools to cope with the ups and downs of life and perform better under stress.
You experience ANXIETY, FEAR, or WORRY and you want to learn how to prevent de-escalate these emotions.
You are tired of feeling like your emotions are outside of your CONTROL.
You no longer want to experience DRAMA, fighting or emotional turmoil in your life.
You want to understand your emotions, how they work, and how you can manage them.
You want to learn how to take control of your thoughts, avoid negative, compulsive THINKING and silence your inner critic
You’re a life coach, counselor, social worker, teacher, nurse or parent who wants to HELP OTHERS learn to take control of their emotions.

requirements: I hope you are excited to try the ideas in this course
This course is great if you have days where you feel like you didn't do enough to move your life forward. We'll fix that for you!
courses.description:
Use industry-tested and science-based methods to get more done in less time, boost your career or business, and reclaim your work-life balance. Focus on results and fulfillment - without the burnout.


MODERN AND RESEARCH-BASED APPROACH: Effortless Productivity for When Nothing Else Works


Energy + Timing = Peak Performance.
If you’ve tried every productivity hack and still feel drained, this course offers a different approach. Grounded in the latest research, it helps you pinpoint the exact times you’re at your mental best and when to step back.


Learn the optimal moments for deep, focused work and when to recharge, so you can work smarter and get more out of each day.


FREE UP TIME BY AVOIDING DISTRACTIONS, AND LOW-POTENTIAL TASKS


We all have tasks that get handed to us, we choose poorly, or seem fun but don’t add value. I’ll help you sharpen your priorities so you can cut out low-impact tasks and projects. This means freeing up substantial time—for yourself or for the work that truly matters.


PERFORM LIKE THE TOP 1%


When you focus on your most impactful tasks during your peak performance hours, everything changes. By dedicating ample time to what truly matters, you’ll produce work that’s 10X better than before.
Produce work that's 10X better, and watch it drive 10X results.
Week by week, month by month, you'll see the compounding effect: greater achievements in your career or business and undeniable professional growth. All while witnessing your own personal transformation unfold.


DO YOU FEEL LIKE YOU NEVER HAVE ENOUGH TIME? STRUGGLING TO STAY ORGANIZED?


Many people who have a 9-5 job or are working on their own business feel exactly the same. There seems to be always too many things to do, too many people wanting your attention, and not enough time to do your best work or focus on what you love.


Now you can finally learn an efficient way to prioritize your goals, and turn those priorities into a schedule that you can easily follow and not stray from. You'll end up accomplishing your most important work to your best abilities, while removing all the time wasters.


NEVER HAVE ENOUGH TIME FOR YOURSELF?


Does it seem like you have so many things to do that you never have enough time for yourself? At one time, I felt that too. I felt like I was mostly spending my time on work, and things I wanted to do for fun or personal fulfillment were getting left behind.
This course will help you regain more of your own time without sacrificing career growth. In fact, I'll show you task prioritization techniques which will help you excel at your career while having more time for yourself.


LEARN HOW THE TOP-1% PRIORITIZE TASKS


CEOs like Jeff Bezos or Elon Musk don't let themselves be controlled by short-term stressors and pressures. Instead, they ask:
"What can I do today that will get me 100X exponential results in 5 years?"
Take Amazon, for example. They could charge more, but by focusing on long-term gains with low prices, they’ve become the biggest retailer in the world.
This course will teach you to create the same kind of lasting, exponential impact in your own work.


MANAGE STRESS AND SHORT-TERM PRESSURES WHILE WORKING


Why don't most people focus on the long-term? Because when you are under stress, the only thing you can do is focus on removing the immediate stressor or pain point.
But after you learn to manage the stress from short-term pressures, you'll be able to give 100% of your effort to your most impactful tasks, and truly succeed.


ACHIEVE FULFILLMENT AND WORK-LIFE-BALANCE


After focusing on your most impactful tasks and doing better work in those, you'll have less stress in your life and more free time.
You'll be able to use your newly found free time to do fulfilling tasks and whatever makes you happy.


THE IMPORTANCE OF DEVELOPING SOFT SKILLS FOR BUSINESS


In professional settings, we often compete with co-workers or other businesses that have similar skillsets. Soft skills like leadership, self-management, personal development, time management, and productivity will help you get ahead.
Improve your soft skills, and watch your business or career skyrocket.


CASE STUDY: HOW THIS COURSE HELPED A STUDENT BUILD A $10,000,000 BUSINESS


You’ll also see a case study of a student from this course who applied these same prioritization techniques to their business. By focusing on high-impact tasks, they went from nearly zero revenue to dominating their niche - an approach you can implement in your own business too.


CASE STUDY OF MY DATA-DRIVEN SUCCESSFUL BUSINESS PRIORITIZATION


Years ago, I took a hard look at my business by putting every project into Excel, analyzing whether the time I invested was actually driving growth.
Through this data-driven approach, I identified projects that needed more focus—and many that I could eliminate entirely.
By zeroing in on high-impact tasks, I grew my business significantly while freeing up more personal time.
This course is built on these real-world insights and strategies that are also backed by scientific research and years of industry success.
These proven and industry-tested methods will help you achieve similar results.


IMAGINE HAVING ENOUGH TIME FOR YOURSELF AND YOUR WORK


Imagine ending your workday feeling accomplished and stress-free, with the evening free to spend on what you love - whether that's time with family, hobbies, or self-care. This isn't just a dream - it's what my students achieve every day.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND WITH TIME MANAGEMENT
I’ve been in your shoes - years ago my schedule was random, and I worked on whatever I had to work on, but I had no structure, and I was distracted easily.
I just didn't know the optimal way to work, and my results were mediocre.
After countless hours of research, trial, and error, I finally uncovered the core time management skills that truly make a difference:
1) Identification of the most impactful tasks (and you’ll learn the best way to do that)
2) Prioritizing the most impactful tasks, and taking unhelpful tasks out of my schedule
3) Focused work after knowing that the task I am working on will be truly difference-making
4) Better self-management in terms of sleep, hydration, and energy levels resulting in maximizing my mental abilities


These steps transformed how I work, and I never looked back. I started not only accomplishing more with my time, but the results and outcomes became exponentially better.


TIME MANAGEMENT AND SCHEDULING WILL HELP YOU ANTICIPATE STRESSFUL MOMENTS


Entrepreneurs and employees often experience stress when they have too much to do and are not able to handle it all at once.
With better time management, when you learn exactly how to set time aside for every task on your to-do list, you’ll massively reduce stress and overwhelm. You’ll anticipate the workload and time needed protecting your health and sanity!


RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT


If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


WILL YOU BREAK FREE FROM THE DAILY GRIND AND TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR TIME AND SUCCESS?


You can continue handling tasks the way you are now, with the familiar rush and stress of always playing catch-up. Or, you can learn to manage your time and energy like the most successful people do, achieving new levels of productivity and peace.
We all have the same 24 hours each day.
The difference between simply getting by and truly excelling lies in learning to manage these critical resources—your time and energy—effectively.
Start a new way of living (proven and tested): with a clear schedule, fewer stressful surprises, and the confidence of knowing each moment is aligned with your goals.


Enroll now, there’s no risk!


MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE


The time management course comes with an unconditional, Udemy-backed, 30-day money-back guarantee. This is not just a guarantee, it's my personal promise to you that I will go out of my way to help you succeed.


DON'T LET TIME SLIP AWAY


Invest in your future. Enroll now and gain the lifelong skill of time management to help you do better at everything you do from now on.
target_audience: Busy professionals looking to boost their careers without sacrificing personal time
Entrepreneurs aiming to grow their businesses efficiently
Students seeking to balance academic success with a fulfilling lifestyle
Anyone overwhelmed by their schedule and wants to take control of their time
Those who’ve tried various systems but found they fell short of real, lasting results

requirements: Be open to the ideas that will help you with stress management and anxiety
courses.description:
Relieve your stress now—and discover how to harness it as a powerful tool to level up your life!
You’ll see cutting-edge research that reveals the difference between bad stress and good stress. While bad stress drains you, good stress can sharpen your focus, fuel your ambition, and push you to meet your biggest challenges head-on.
Your body is built to handle stress—it’s been doing it for millions of years.
Now, it's time to make stress work for you!
Learn to manage it effectively, so you can improve every area of your life, take control of your business or career, and live with calm, purpose, and confidence—without letting stress and anxiety hold you back.


DECREASE THE BAD, CHRONIC STRESS


Chronic stress, sometimes referred to simply as bad stress, holds your business, career, and personal life hostage.
If you want to make clear, confident decisions, you need to control it before it controls you.
The most effective way? Master time management and prioritize tasks that truly matter.
Through planning and being more organized, you'll decrease uncertainty in your life, and minimize stress and anxiety.
Once you identify the right tasks that will be the most impactful for your business or career, you'll accomplish them better, will feel immediate stress relief, and not have stress linger long-term.


STRESS ISN'T ALL BAD - LEARN TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF IT!


We tend to think of stress as bad. But we need some stress to feel alive. Without any stress, life would be boring and uninteresting.
Stress also plays a role in fun challenges that you overcome and grow in the process. When you have the right amount of stress in your life, it adds to the quality of your life.


YOUR BODY'S STRESS RESPONSE


A common stress response is to:


Increase focus on the task at hand
Release adrenaline for energy
So stress can make you actually better at meeting challenges! Your stress response is an evolutionary tool to help you overcome challenges.
Would you like to learn how to use your body's natural stress response to improve performance in physical and cognitive tasks?
This course shows you step-by-step how to conquer stress!


CREATE A BETTER LIFE WHERE STRESS DOESN’T CONTROL YOU


BAD stress creates a feeling of overwhelm, drains your energy, clouds your decisions, and impacts your health, relationships, and success.
You can take back control and eliminate unnecessary stress—all while achieving more in your life and work. It’s not about working harder; it’s about working smarter.
Most stress begins with poor time management and scattered priorities.
Think about it—how can a CEO overseeing massive companies stay calmer than someone managing a single desk? It’s all in how they plan and prioritize.
In this course, you’ll discover strategies tailored to your needs, helping you organize your time, focus on what matters, and build a system that keeps stress in check while driving results.


LEARN ANXIETY MANAGEMENT


Anxiety can arise for many reasons, some of which can be difficult to pinpoint. But there are some causes of anxiety such as from fear or from irrational fears that can be easier to address.
In this course, you'll learn to decrease anxiety from irrational fears with rational thinking and exposure therapy.


STRESS MANAGEMENT THROUGH BETTER TIME MANAGEMENT


This course now includes powerful techniques, apps, and tools to help you take control of your time—and, in turn, your stress.
By managing your time, you will also manage your stress. If you stick to a well-made and well-thought-out schedule, you will naturally decrease stress levels. There won't be many panic moments or major emergencies that cause spikes in anxiety.


TIME MANAGEMENT AND SCHEDULING WILL HELP YOU ANTICIPATE STRESSFUL MOMENTS


Entrepreneurs often experience stress when they have too much to do and are not able to handle it all at once.
If you practice good time management, by setting time aside for every task on your to-do list, the time you spend on that task won't be as stressful or overwhelming because you will anticipate it.
And I know it sounds easy in theory and it’s harder in practice. That’s why I included strategies that will almost automate this for you so you don’t have to rely on pure will.
